name: Stars Beyond
description:
Travel Across the Stars in the intergalactic conflict that will determine the fate of humanity! Stars Beyond is a grand strategy game, where the player must utilize their skills in economic planning and cunning strategy to outmaneuver the mysterious alien threat in our way! 

**Disclaimer** - Stars Beyond is best played in fullscreen mode!

**Controls**

Arrow Keys - Control camera

Left Mouse Button - Controls User Interface interaction

The game was planned in a way to maximize game time - with shorter game time and less 'grindy' mechanics - instead of the long games that the genre is typically known for!

Any and all feedback or critique is welcome! This is my first game, so I hope you guys enjoy it!

 

Thank you to all the artists who were kind enough to provide free licenses for the use of their artwork! I have made sure to include their username and a link to their itch.io pages in the "Credits" menu within the game!
